pages.text: The Boss of the $(thing)Aether's Bronze Dungeon$(), the $(thing)Slider$() is akin to a large block of stone. As such it cannot be damaged by conventional means, and you must utilize a $(item)Pickaxe$() to chip away at its health. While fighting, the $(thing)Slider$() will move in simple straight lines in an attempt to crush you. Once it takes a large amount of damage, its eye will turn red and it move much faster.

pages.name: The Slider
